author: Nick Nairn
method: Mix the ¼ mushroom, breadcrumbs, garlic, Edam, parsley and oil together and season with salt and pepper.  Fill the whole mushroom with this stuffing and bake in the oven for ten minutes.  Serve.
ingredients: 1 large flat mushroom,  ¼ mushroom, finely chopped,  85g/3oz white breadcrumbs,  2 cloves garlic, finely chopped,  50g/1¾oz grated Edam cheese,  handful flatleaf parsley,  1 tbsp olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
